medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Abdominal pain started 18 hours prior to evaluation, at 9 PM. The pain was sharp, infra-umbilical, and then migrated to the right lower quadrant (RLQ). The patient attempted to vomit once but did not succeed. No episodes of nausea, vomiting, diarrhea, fever, or chills were reported. This was the first occurrence of such pain. The last meal was approximately 24 hours ago.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Broken left arm treated with a cast
